title: Exact DM-to-Baryon Ratio from Division Algebra Dimensions
subtitle: Cosmic Budget from Pure Algebra

dm_baryon_ratio.statement: The dark-matter-to-baryon ratio is exactly dim(H)^2/n_gen = 16/3
dm_baryon_ratio.q827_answer: YES - DM/baryon = 16/3 from division algebra dimensions

derivation.step_1: Quaternionic SWAP code: dim(H) = 4 modes per site

why_dim_H_squared.reason: Vacuum SWAP code has H tensor H structure
why_dim_H_squared.analogy: Same structure as J_3(O_C) = O tensor C for fermion masses

why_n_gen_3.reason: J_3(O) exists but J_4(O) does not (Zorn/Albert theorem)
why_n_gen_3.quaternionic: 3 imaginary quaternion units (i,j,k) = 3 breaking directions = 3 generations

dm_baryon_ratio.testable: DM/baryon ratio = 16/3 = 5.333; test with precision Planck/DESI/Euclid data

why_dim_H.H_modes: Have mass, no EM charge -> dark matter
why_dim_H.O_modes: Strong force, confined, mostly binding energy

omega_dm.testable: Omega_DM = 4/15 = 0.2667; precision CMB and galaxy surveys

omega_b.testable: Omega_B = 1/20 = 0.05; BBN and CMB precision measurements

matter_modes_19.interpretation: Total matter modes (DM + baryonic) out of 60

omega_de.interpretation: DE = vacuum code error rate = modes neither symmetric nor coherently broken

cosmic_budget.theorem: Complete Cosmic Budget from Division Algebra Dimensions
cosmic_budget.statement: All three cosmological density parameters derived from dim(R,C,H,O) and n_gen
cosmic_budget.significance: Three cosmological parameters from zero free parameters. All within Planck error bars.
cosmic_budget.testable: All four quantities testable with CMB, BAO, galaxy surveys, BBN

deep_connection.theorem: dim(H) - 1 = n_gen = 3 is a deep algebraic identity

connection.physical: 3 imaginary quaternion units = 3 spatial dims = 3 generations

deep_connection.testable: No direct test (we live in the H universe), but constrains theoretical multiverse models

analogy.comparison: Both ~1% base error correctable by algebraic structure

further_corrections: QCD: alpha_s/pi corrections to baryon sector mass
Neutrino: mass contributions to DM/baryon boundary
O/H coset: higher-order division algebra terms

dim_h_from_k.implication: All cosmic budget formulas expressible in terms of k

unified_structure.lepton_masses: Determined by k^2, n_gen, alpha, v
unified_structure.shared_parameters: k^2 = 2 and n_gen = 3 appear in BOTH
unified_structure.implication: Same algebraic structure governs particle AND cosmic scales

koide_cross_validation.testable: Any deviation in cosmic budget should correlate with lepton mass corrections

sigma_15.theorem: Sigma = 15 is the complete division algebra mode count
sigma_15.termination: Sedenions (dim 16) fail -> Sigma includes ALL valid modes

predictions.time_independence: Algebraic ratios do not evolve; measured Omega values do

observational_tests.testable: All predictions testable with next-generation surveys within 5-10 years

Q487.question: Is Big Bang the state of minimum I?
Q487.answer: YES - dI/dt > 0 always (Phase 111), so I increases monotonically. Big Bang = I_min = maximal SWAP symmetry.

Q737.question: Is universe's initial state SWAP-symmetric?
Q737.answer: YES - Phase 154 Theorem 4: inflation = period of maximal SWAP symmetry (eta ~ 1).

Q729.question: Can SWAP breaking be reversed?
Q729.answer: NO - dI/dt = hbar*c/(2d) > 0 is algebraic (hbar > 0, c > 0, d > 0). Not statistical.

Q756.question: Can SWAP coherence be restored (time reversal)?
Q756.answer: NO globally - local quantum coherence possible within decoherence time, but macroscopic reversal impossible.

Q743.question: Is Hawking radiation SWAP breaking?
Q743.answer: YES - Phase 153 Theorem 4: Hawking radiation = SWAP error leakage at code boundary.

Q742.question: What role does SWAP play in black holes?
Q742.answer: Black hole = complete SWAP breaking (all modes projected). Horizon = SWAP code boundary.

Q761.question: Is Higgs mechanism SWAP breaking?
Q761.answer: YES - Phase 115 derived Higgs from coordination. Phase 154 confirmed all SSB = SWAP breaking (Q740).

Q508.question: CP violation origin?
Q508.answer: G2 chirality of octonionic SWAP breaking. CKM phase = remnant of fundamental G2 CP violation.

Q731.question: Is Many-Worlds interpretation SWAP-symmetric?
Q731.answer: YES - MWI is the SWAP-symmetric description. Each observer experiences one branch via SWAP breaking.

Q296.question: Total ordering entropy of universe?
Q296.answer: S_ordering ~ 26.8% of S_total ~ 10^122 bits (holographic bound). So S_ordering ~ 2.7 x 10^121.

Q583.question: How does inflation connect to Lambda?
Q583.answer: During inflation: SWAP maintained, error rate negligible. Post-inflation: errors accumulate = Lambda.

Q732.question: Quantum Zeno effect as repeated SWAP breaking?
Q732.answer: YES - Frequent measurement = frequent SWAP breaking prevents coherent evolution.

Q734.question: Entanglement = SWAP export?
Q734.answer: YES - Phase 153 ER=EPR: entangling two systems = sharing SWAP pairs across them.

Q638.question: Info-theoretic meaning of dim(O) = 8?
Q638.answer: 8 = max independent SWAP modes before obstruction. Sets max gauge group dimension (SU(3) has dim 8).

Q36.question: The Beginning of Time
Q36.answer: Time = SWAP breaking. Before SWAP breaks (inflation), there is no time. Beginning = onset of breaking.
